Projects

Klug Programming Language

klug is an interpreted programming language for beginners.the purpose of this project was to learn how programming languages are made and how they work under the hood. the project was implemented on java language and the instruction of the klug language run on top of java virtual machine.

Source Code

Roll The Dice

Roll the dice is a multiplayer game.players roll a dice and the player with most points will win the game.the project was implemented on nodejs and web sockets. web socket is network protocol that allow two or more machines communicate with each other and provide full duplex capability which means data can be sent or receive at same time.

See Live Source Code

Tic Tac Toe with An Ai

Tic tac toe is classical game and this version support unbeatable ai.The project was implemented on html and css, javascript and the algorithm behind ai is minimax algorithm.

See Live Source Code
